section.title: Introduction
section.para: This is an example for a simple introduction main chapter. This is an example for a link to Sourceforge: SourceForge .

section.title: Terminology
section.para:
The key words must , must not , required , shall , shall not
, should , should not
, recommended , may , and optional in this &standard; are to be interpreted as described in
. Note that for reasons of style, these words are not capitalized in this document.
